en.subject: ЁЯОп 3 Quick Wins to Maximize Your Purra Value
en.preheader: Simple actions that deliver immediate results

header.title: Quick Wins for Immediate Impact
header.subtitle: Get more value in less time

body.intro: We've analyzed your account and identified 3 quick actions that can deliver immediate value. Each takes less than 10 minutes but can have significant impact.

win1.title: 1. {{ quickWin1 }}
win1.description: This simple action could save you time on repetitive tasks.

win2.title: 2. {{ quickWin2 }}
win2.description: Enable this feature to get automated insights.

win3.title: 3. {{ quickWin3 }}
win3.description: A quick configuration change for better visibility.

potentialValue.title: ЁЯТб Estimated Value
potentialValue.description: Implementing these three quick wins could deliver an estimated **${{ estimatedSavings }}** in annual value through time savings and better procurement decisions.

howTo.title: Getting Started
steps: Click the button below to access your personalized action plan
Follow the step-by-step guides for each quick win
See immediate results in your dashboard
Share your success with your team

support.title: Need Help?
support.description: Our team is standing by to help you implement these quick wins. Schedule a 15-minute call or use our live chat for instant assistance.
